import React from 'react' import './style.scss' const Card = ({dataItem, setDataBook, setShow}) => { const onClickCard = () =>{ setDataBook(dataItem) setShow(true) } const [categories] = dataItem?.volumeInfo; return (

{categories || 'no'}

{title}

{dataItem?.volumeInfo?.authors}

) } export default Card
